alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 28 at 9:52AM PST until November 28 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Localized gusts over 60 mph in the Sierra. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Winds this strong could make driving difficult for travelers on roads and highways in the area including Interstates 15 and 40...especially for high profile vehicles and motorcycles. Reduced visibility is possible due to blowing dust and sand. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Western Mojave Desert
